{{Wired embedded system |brand=Cloud Engines |model=Pogoplug |revision=v4 A1 (Mobile) |upc=850877002290 |asin=B005GM1Q1O |price=79.99 |est_release_date=2012 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |availability=common |type=NAS |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Marvell |cpu1_model=88F6192 |cpu1_cspeed=800 |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Hynix |fla1_model=H27U1G8F2BTR |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=H5PS1G63EFR |expansion_if_types=USB, SDHC |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag=yes,, 6-pin header,, J17 |serial=yes,, 3.3V TTL,, 4-pad header (115200,8,N,1),, J11 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Marvell |eth_chip2_model=88E1116R |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=4.5V/18V Synchronous Step-Down Three Buck Switcher;Texas Instruments;TPS65251;;1;,,, 30V, 7A N-Channel MOSFET;Fairchild Semiconductor;FDS8984;;1;,,, 5V/12V Synchronous Buck PWM DC/DC Controller;Richtek;RT8105;;1; |stock_boot=U-Boot;1.1.4;Cloud Engines;, |stock_os=Linux;2.6.31.8;KW LSP release 5.1.3 |tp_firmware=Arch Linux (Arm), OpenWrt, |oui_eth=00:25:31 }} [http://pogoplug.com/devices#pick Product page]
